title: Wolfenstein Intro ad replacements.rar
description:
This file has been scanned with NOD and AVG
Please scan ALL your downloads. I do NOT upload virus.

this is to replace all those annoying Logos when the game starts,. Like the "ID Software ad, The Raven Ad", and so on.
All I did was zero out the bik files, "the ads" .
All you have to do is copy these files back into the "activision/Wolfenstein/SP/Base/Video" folder

Then start the game and wala! go straight to killing!!!!!
No more waiting 5 minutes for the damn ads to finish to get to the main menu.
